key_risks: Financial performance and revenue pressure due to cloud migration challenges
Intense competition from Snowflake, Amazon Redshift, Google BigQuery, and Microsoft Azure Synapse
Customer churn and retention risks as clients transition to competing platforms
Operational challenges from workforce layoffs and restructuring efforts
Legal risks from the ongoing lawsuit against SAP for antitrust violations and trade secret theft
controversies: Stock plunge of 13.3% following Q3 2024 earnings report
Lawsuit against SAP for antitrust violations and trade secret theft
Ethical concerns over layoffs and employee treatment during restructuring
social_issues: Ethical concerns regarding employee treatment during financial difficulties
governance_issues: Leadership changes and their impact on company performance
Effectiveness of cost-cutting measures and restructuring efforts
